title: 100% Orange Juice: All Stars Collection – v3.7 + 31 DLCs
body:
100% Orange Juice: All Stars Collection – v3.7 + 31 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Board game, Card game, 2D
Companies: Orange_Juice, Fruitbat Factory
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 3.1 GB
Repack Size: 1.6 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on 100.Percent.Orange.Juice.Railway.Runners.Pack-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-100.percent.orange.juice.railway.runners.pack.iso (3,298,951,168 bytes)
  • Game version: v3.7; 31 DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.1 to 1.6 GB)
  • Installation takes 5-8 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2.7 GB (9.6 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

100% Orange Juice is a digital single/multiplayer board game populated by developer Orange Juice’s all-star cast. Characters from Flying Red Barrel, QP Shooting, Suguri and Sora come together with all-new characters to duke it out… with dice.

This is a world where dogs, people and machines fly through the air. In that world, a small patch of darkness was born. Infinitesimal at first, it gradually began to envelop everything…

A youth named Kai, led by the mysterious life form known as Marie Poppo, begins a journey that will span worlds. The black, bottomless darkness of desire slowly eats away at both Kai and the world itself…

Let Marie Poppo lead you into a mysterious world to play. Grab your deck of cards and let the games begin!

Game Features

  • Dice, cards, stars, battles and pudding
  • 4 Single-player campaigns
  • Playable by up to 4 players online
  • Countless battle combinations
  • Utilize each character’s unique combat attributes
  • More than 50 different cards to collect
  • Character abilities in the form of Hyper Cards
  • Full HD support
  • Redesigned multiplayer experience using Steam’s lobby system
  • Spectator mode
  • Avatar customization
  • New character skins to unlock
  • VAC enabled
  • Custom language support
